0.1.name: wordpress/browser-themer
0.1.description: This plugin will let you the option to choose different themes for each browser. Meanwhile,the plugin have only the options to choose another theme for the following browsers:IE6,IE7,IE8,FF2,FF3,Opera,Chrome,Safari and to all the other browsers which is not have their own option.
